inputs.name: cloneRepo
inputs.label: Clone Repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true the specified repo will be cloned to the localfolder. If false then the localfolder must specify an existing folder that already contains a file structure

inputs.name: repo
inputs.label: Repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: The repo URL to clone e.g dev.azure.com/richardfennell/Git%20project/_git/Git-project.wiki. See documentation for more details https://github.com/rfennell/AzurePipelines/wiki/WIKI-Updater-Tasks

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Checkout Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the pre-existing branch to checkout prior exporting a repo, if left blank the default branch will be used

inputs.name: singleFile
inputs.label: Single file to export
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the single file to be exported, default is empty i.e. whole repo is exported e.g. myfile.md

inputs.name: useAgentToken
inputs.label: Run with Build Agent Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true use the built in agent OAUTH token. OAUTH script access must be enabled for the agent

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password/PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password/PAT for authentication (recommended stored as secret variable)

inputs.name: localpath
inputs.label: Local folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to clone the repo into

inputs.name: rootExportPath
inputs.label: Local folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the root of the cloned the repo if exporting the whole repo, a folder within the repo to export part of the repo or finally the folder containing a single file to export. For this final option the filename must be specified below

inputs.name: ExtraParameters
inputs.label: WIKIPDFExport Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional any extra WikiPDFExport you wish to pass to the command line tool

inputs.name: injectExtraHeader
inputs.label: Inject credentials via Headers
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true, credentials are passed as a header value. If false, the default, they are passed in te URL. To address #613 which is seen on some on-prem instances

inputs.name: overrideExePath
inputs.label: Tool path override
inputs.helpMarkDown: An optional path to a previously download copy of the [AzureDevOps.WikiPDFExport tool](https://github.com/MaxMelcher/AzureDevOps.WikiPDFExport) EXE (Windows) or DLL (Linux/Windows). If not set the task will download the current release of this tool e.g 'c:\myfolder\azuredevops-export-wiki.exe'

inputs.name: downloadPath
inputs.label: The path the tool will be downloaded to
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path the tool will be downloaded to

inputs.name: usePreRelease
inputs.label: Use pre-release versions of the export tool
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true pre-release version of the [AzureDevOps.WikiPDFExport tool](https://github.com/MaxMelcher/AzureDevOps.WikiPDFExport) tool will be used
